data.message: It,s good to be old to have a friend, if you do have a friend or two, cherrish your time together, good friend ship is hard to find.

replies.message: God has richly blessed me with old and new friends.
My Best Friend, Betty and Husband, among others, are watching over us now!  :-{{
When you are a friend to others, it is not difficult to have good friendships no matter how old you are. Friendships come in all ages. Age is just a number, friendship is forever.
I know two of my dearest friends are looking down on us and we lost them too early !  Dolores (Dee) and Jerry Caracapa!
Happy for ya"ll not always you find that now....
AMEN  to having GOOD friends.  Or making new ones.
True friends really are hard to find Gladys and when you do, you cherish them.
I lost my two Best friends ever. Kathy in 2005 @43 and Anne in 2008 @ 57. My life hasn't been the same since!
Good friends are good. to my best friend is Jesus that one. friend u will never lose but are friends here are the best

Some of us losted our best friends for one reason or another and it hurt. like madness, but we have to live on, put your head up and find new earthly friends. Some of us find that hard to do, but get up, get out the house, mangel with other people, join groups, the ymca, church groups, senior groups or other groups you heard about. You will soon be happy laughing and have friends. Love
